Package com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps

Interface Summary
App_SAP_TraXAPI This interface defines the Service Access Point of an application towards the TraX API, therefore the name.
AsynchronousResponse This is the superinterface of all asynchronous responses returned to App_SAP_TraXAPI.update(String, AsynchronousResponse).
SynchronousRequest This is the superinterface of all synchronous requests issued to TraXAPI_SAP_App.
SynchronousResponse This is the superclass of all synchronous responses returned by TraXAPI_SAP_App.
TraXAPI_SAP_App This interface defines the Service Access Point of the TraX API towards applications, therefore the name.
 

Class Summary
AsynchronousRequest This is the superclass of all asynchronous requests issued to TraXAPI_SAP_App.
DistanceBasedPositionUpdateRequest Use this class for asynchronous tracking of the position of a single target user according to a distance-based policy.
HandleManager Use this class to retrieve a unique TraXHandle, which is needed to access the TraXAPI_SAP_App - interface.
KNNRequest Use this request to keep up-to-date about the ordered k-nearest-neighbors of a mobile target user.
KNNResponse This class wraps a k-nearest neighbor event triggered by a corresponding KNNRequest.
NotificationRequest Use this synchronous request with the TraXAPI_SAP_App-interface in order to notify (in a proactive / push fashion) a set of targets about an arbitrary application message.
NotificationResponse This class encapsulates the result of a NotificationRequest.
PeriodicPositionUpdateRequest Use this class for asynchronous tracking of the position of a single target user according to a periodic policy.
PollingRequest Use this synchronous request with the TraXAPI_SAP_App-interface in order to poll the current positions of one or more target users.
PollingResponse This class encapsulates the result of a PollingRequest.
PositionUpdateResponse This class encapsulates the asynchronous result of a DistanceBasedPositionUpdateRequest, ZoneBasedPositionUpdateRequest or a PeriodicPositionUpdateRequest.
ProximityObservation This class specifies which pair of target users and how this pair is observed for proactive proximity and separation events.
ProximityObserved This class wraps a proximity or separation event between two mobile target users.
ProximityRequest Use a ProximityRequest to be notified about proactive proximity and separation events regarding pairs of mobile users.
ProximityResponse An ProximityResponse is passed to App_SAP_TraXAPI.update(String, AsynchronousResponse) and corresponds to a previously submitted ProximityRequest.
SingleTargetNotificationRequest  
SingleTargetNotificationResponse This class encapsulates the response of a single target to a NotificationRequest.
TraXHandle Use this class to access the Aloqa location services via the TraXAPI_SAP_App - interface.
ZoneBasedPositionUpdateRequest Use this class for asynchronous tracking of the position of a single target user according to a zone-based policy.
